046/**
047 * Represents an OpenAPI schema definition.
048 *
049 * <p>
050 * The schema definition can be applied to any HTTP parts such as bodies, headers, query/form parameters, and URL path parts.
051 * <br>The API is generic enough to apply to any path part although some attributes may only applicable for certain parts.
052 *
053 * <p>
054 * Schema objects are created via builders instantiated through the {@link #create()} method.
055 *
056 * <h5 class='section'>Jakarta Bean Validation Support:</h5>
057 * <p>
058 * As of 9.2.0, this class supports Jakarta Bean Validation constraint annotations (e.g., <c>@NotNull</c>, <c>@Size</c>, <c>@Min</c>, <c>@Max</c>).
059 * When these annotations are encountered during schema building, they are automatically mapped to corresponding OpenAPI schema properties:
060 * <ul>
061 *    <li><c>@NotNull</c> → <c>required(true)</c>
062 *    <li><c>@Size(min=x, max=y)</c> → <c>minLength/maxLength</c> and <c>minItems/maxItems</c>
063 *    <li><c>@Min(value)</c> → <c>minimum(value)</c>
064 *    <li><c>@Max(value)</c> → <c>maximum(value)</c>
065 *    <li><c>@Pattern(regexp)</c> → <c>pattern(regexp)</c>
066 *    <li><c>@Email</c> → <c>format("email")</c>
067 *    <li><c>@Positive/@PositiveOrZero/@Negative/@NegativeOrZero</c> → Corresponding min/max constraints
068 *    <li><c>@NotEmpty</c> → <c>required(true) + minLength(1)/minItems(1)</c>
069 *    <li><c>@NotBlank</c> → <c>required(true) + minLength(1) + pattern</c>
070 *    <li><c>@DecimalMin/@DecimalMax</c> → <c>minimum/maximum</c> with optional <c>exclusiveMinimum/exclusiveMaximum</c>
071 * </ul>
072 * <p>
073 * This integration uses pure reflection and does not require <c>jakarta.validation-api</c> as a dependency.
074 * The annotations are detected and processed automatically when present.
075 *
076 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
077 *    <li class='note'>This class is thread safe and reusable.
078 * </ul>
079 *
080 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
081 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/OpenApiBasics">OpenApi Basics</a>
082 * </ul>
083 */
084public class HttpPartSchema {
085
086   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
087   // Static
088   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
089
090   /** Reusable instance of this object, all default settings. */
091   public static final HttpPartSchema DEFAULT = HttpPartSchema.create().allowEmptyValue(true).build();
092
093   /** Boolean type */
094   public static final HttpPartSchema T_BOOLEAN = HttpPartSchema.tBoolean().build();
095
096   /** File type */
097   public static final HttpPartSchema T_FILE = HttpPartSchema.tFile().build();
098
099   /** Integer type */
100   public static final HttpPartSchema T_INTEGER = HttpPartSchema.tInteger().build();
101
102   /** Int32 type */
103   public static final HttpPartSchema T_INT32 = HttpPartSchema.tInt32().build();
104

106   public static final HttpPartSchema T_INT64 = HttpPartSchema.tInt64().build();

180   /**
181    * Instantiates a new builder for this object.
182    *
183    * @return A new builder for this object.
184    */
185   public static Builder create() {
186      return new Builder();
187   }
188
189   /**
190    * Shortcut for <c><jsm>create</jsm>().type(HttpPartDataType.<jsf>BOOLEAN</jsf>)</c>.
191    *
192    * @return A new builder for this object.
193    */
194   public static Builder tBoolean() {
195      return create().tBoolean();
196   }

519
520   /**
521    * Finds the schema information for the specified method parameter.
522    *
523    * <p>
524    * This method will gather all the schema information from the annotations at the following locations:
525    * <ul>
526    *    <li>The method parameter.
527    *    <li>The method parameter class.
528    *    <li>The method parameter parent classes and interfaces.
529    * </ul>
530    *
531    * @param c
532    *    The annotation to look for.
533    *    <br>Valid values:
534    *    <ul>
535    *       <li>{@link Content}
536    *       <li>{@link Header}
537    *       <li>{@link Query}
538    *       <li>{@link FormData}
539    *       <li>{@link Path}
540    *       <li>{@link Response}
541    *       <li>{@link HasQuery}
542    *       <li>{@link HasFormData}
543    *    </ul>
544    * @param mpi The Java method parameter.
545    * @return The schema information about the parameter.
546    */
547   public static HttpPartSchema create(Class<? extends Annotation> c, ParamInfo mpi) {
548      return create().applyAll(c, mpi).build();
549   }
550
551   /**
552    * Finds the schema information for the specified method return.
553    *
554    * <p>
555    * This method will gather all the schema information from the annotations at the following locations:
556    * <ul>
557    *    <li>The method.
558    *    <li>The method return class.
559    *    <li>The method return parent classes and interfaces.
560    * </ul>
561    *
562    * @param c
563    *    The annotation to look for.
564    *    <br>Valid values:
565    *    <ul>
566    *       <li>{@link Content}
567    *       <li>{@link Header}
568    *       <li>{@link Query}
569    *       <li>{@link FormData}
570    *       <li>{@link Path}
571    *       <li>{@link Response}
572    *       <li>{@link HasQuery}
573    *       <li>{@link HasFormData}
574    *    </ul>
575    * @param m
576    *    The Java method with the return type being checked.
577    * @return The schema information about the parameter.
578    */
579   public static HttpPartSchema create(Class<? extends Annotation> c, Method m) {
580      return create().applyAll(c, m).build();
581   }
582
583   /**
584    * Finds the schema information for the specified class.
585    *
586    * <p>
587    * This method will gather all the schema information from the annotations on the class and all parent classes/interfaces.
588    *
589    * @param c
590    *    The annotation to look for.
591    *    <br>Valid values:
592    *    <ul>
593    *       <li>{@link Content}
594    *       <li>{@link Header}
595    *       <li>{@link Query}
596    *       <li>{@link FormData}
597    *       <li>{@link Path}
598    *       <li>{@link Response}
599    *       <li>{@link HasQuery}
600    *       <li>{@link HasFormData}
601    *    </ul>
602    * @param t
603    *    The class containing the parameter.
604    * @return The schema information about the parameter.
605    */
606   public static HttpPartSchema create(Class<? extends Annotation> c, java.lang.reflect.Type t) {
607      return create().applyAll(c, t).build();
608   }
609
610   /**
611    * Shortcut for calling <c>create().type(type);</c>
612    *
613    * @param type The schema type value.
614    * @return A new builder.
615    */
616   public static Builder create(String type) {
617      return create().type(type);
618   }
619
620   /**
621    * Shortcut for calling <c>create().type(type).format(format);</c>
622    *
623    * @param type The schema type value.
624    * @param format The schema format value.
625    * @return A new builder.
626    */
627   public static Builder create(String type, String format) {
628      return create().type(type).format(format);
629   }
630
631   /**
632    * Finds the schema information on the specified annotation.
633    *
634    * @param a
635    *    The annotation to find the schema information on..
636    * @return The schema information found on the annotation.
637    */
638   public static HttpPartSchema create(Annotation a) {
639      return create().apply(a).build();
640   }
641
642   /**
643    * Finds the schema information on the specified annotation.
644    *
645    * @param a
646    *    The annotation to find the schema information on..
647    * @param defaultName The default part name if not specified on the annotation.
648    * @return The schema information found on the annotation.
649    */
650   public static HttpPartSchema create(Annotation a, String defaultName) {
651      return create().name(defaultName).apply(a).build();
652   }
653
654   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
655   // Builder
656   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
657
658   /**
659    * Builder class.
660    */
661   public static class Builder {
662      String name, _default;
663      Set<Integer> codes;
664      Set<String> _enum;
665      Boolean allowEmptyValue, exclusiveMaximum, exclusiveMinimum, required, uniqueItems, skipIfEmpty;
666      HttpPartCollectionFormat collectionFormat = HttpPartCollectionFormat.NO_COLLECTION_FORMAT;
667      HttpPartDataType type = HttpPartDataType.NO_TYPE;
668      HttpPartFormat format = HttpPartFormat.NO_FORMAT;
669      Pattern pattern;
670      Number maximum, minimum, multipleOf;
671      Long maxLength, minLength, maxItems, minItems, maxProperties, minProperties;
672      Map<String,Object> properties;
673      Object items, additionalProperties;
674      boolean noValidate;
675      Class<? extends HttpPartParser> parser;
676      Class<? extends HttpPartSerializer> serializer;
677      // JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 properties
678      String _const;
679      String[] examples;
680      Boolean deprecated;
681      Number exclusiveMaximumValue, exclusiveMinimumValue;
682
683      /**
684       * Instantiates a new {@link HttpPartSchema} object based on the configuration of this builder.
685       *
686       * <p>
687       * This method can be called multiple times to produce new schema objects.
688       *
689       * @return
690       *    A new {@link HttpPartSchema} object.
691       *    <br>Never <jk>null</jk>.
692       */
693      public HttpPartSchema build() {
694         return new HttpPartSchema(this);
695      }
696
697      Builder apply(Class<? extends Annotation> c, ParamInfo mpi) {
698         apply(c, mpi.getParameterType().innerType());
699         mpi.forEachDeclaredAnnotation(c, x -> true, this::apply);
700         return this;
701      }
702
703      Builder applyAll(Class<? extends Annotation> c, ParamInfo mpi) {
704         return apply(Schema.class, mpi).apply(c, mpi);
705      }
706
707      Builder apply(Class<? extends Annotation> c, Method m) {
708         apply(c, m.getGenericReturnType());
709         Annotation a = m.getAnnotation(c);
710         if (a != null)
711            return apply(a);
712         return this;
713      }
714
715      Builder applyAll(Class<? extends Annotation> c, Method m) {
716         return apply(Schema.class, m).apply(c, m);
717      }
718
719      Builder apply(Class<? extends Annotation> c, java.lang.reflect.Type t) {
720         if (t instanceof Class<?>) {
721            ClassInfo.of((Class<?>)t).forEachAnnotation(c, x -> true, this::apply);
722         } else if (Value.isType(t)) {
723            apply(c, Value.getParameterType(t));
724         }
725         return this;
726      }
727
728      Builder applyAll(Class<? extends Annotation> c, java.lang.reflect.Type t) {
729         return apply(Schema.class, t).apply(c, t);
730      }
731
732      /**
733       * Apply the specified annotation to this schema.
734       *
735       * @param a The annotation to apply.
736       * @return This object.
737       */
738      public Builder apply(Annotation a) {
739         if (a instanceof Content)
740            apply((Content)a);
741         else if (a instanceof Header)
742            apply((Header)a);
743         else if (a instanceof FormData)
744            apply((FormData)a);
745         else if (a instanceof Query)
746            apply((Query)a);
747         else if (a instanceof Path)
748            apply((Path)a);
749         else if (a instanceof Response)
750            apply((Response)a);
751         else if (a instanceof StatusCode)
752            apply((StatusCode)a);
753         else if (a instanceof HasQuery)
754            apply((HasQuery)a);
755         else if (a instanceof HasFormData)
756            apply((HasFormData)a);
757         else if (a instanceof Schema)
758            apply((Schema)a);
759         else if (a.annotationType().getName().startsWith("jakarta.validation.constraints."))
760            applyJakartaValidation(a);
761         else
762            throw new BasicRuntimeException("Builder.apply(@{0}) not defined", className(a));
763         return this;
764      }
765
766      Builder apply(Content a) {
767         if (! SchemaAnnotation.empty(a.schema()))
768            apply(a.schema());
769         _default(a.def());
770         return this;
771      }
772
773      Builder apply(Header a) {
774         if (! SchemaAnnotation.empty(a.schema()))
775            apply(a.schema());
776         name(firstNonEmpty(a.name(), a.value()));
777         _default(a.def());
778         parser(a.parser());
779         serializer(a.serializer());
780         return this;
781      }
782
783      Builder apply(FormData a) {
784         if (! SchemaAnnotation.empty(a.schema()))
785            apply(a.schema());
786         name(firstNonEmpty(a.name(), a.value()));
787         _default(a.def());
788         parser(a.parser());
789         serializer(a.serializer());
790         return this;
791      }
792
793      Builder apply(Query a) {
794         if (! SchemaAnnotation.empty(a.schema()))
795            apply(a.schema());
796         name(firstNonEmpty(a.name(), a.value()));
797         _default(a.def());
798         parser(a.parser());
799         serializer(a.serializer());
800         return this;
801      }
802
803      Builder apply(Path a) {
804         if (! SchemaAnnotation.empty(a.schema()))
805            apply(a.schema());
806         name(firstNonEmpty(a.name(), a.value()));
807         _default(a.def());
808         parser(a.parser());
809         serializer(a.serializer());
810
811         // Path remainder always allows empty value.
812         if (startsWith(name, '/')) {
813            allowEmptyValue();
814            required(false);
815         } else if (required == null) {
816            required(true);
817         }
818
819         return this;
820      }
821
822      Builder apply(Response a) {
823         allowEmptyValue(true);
824         apply(a.schema());
825         parser(a.parser());
826         required(false);
827         serializer(a.serializer());
828         return this;
829      }
830
831      Builder apply(StatusCode a) {
832         codes(a.value());
833         return this;
834      }
835
836      Builder apply(Items a) {
837         _default(joinnlOrNull(a._default(), a.df()));
838         _enum(toSet(a._enum(), a.e()));
839         collectionFormat(firstNonEmpty(a.collectionFormat(), a.cf()));
840         exclusiveMaximum(a.exclusiveMaximum() || a.emax());
841         exclusiveMinimum(a.exclusiveMinimum() || a.emin());
842         format(firstNonEmpty(a.format(), a.f()));
843         items(a.items());
844         maximum(toNumber(a.maximum(), a.max()));
845         maxItems(firstNmo(a.maxItems(), a.maxi()));
846         maxLength(firstNmo(a.maxLength(), a.maxl()));
847         minimum(toNumber(a.minimum(), a.min()));
848         minItems(firstNmo(a.minItems(), a.mini()));
849         minLength(firstNmo(a.minLength(), a.minl()));
850         multipleOf(toNumber(a.multipleOf(), a.mo()));
851         pattern(firstNonEmpty(a.pattern(), a.p()));
852         type(firstNonEmpty(a.type(), a.t()));
853         uniqueItems(a.uniqueItems() || a.ui());         return this;
854      }
855
856      Builder apply(SubItems a) {
857         _default(joinnlOrNull(a._default(), a.df()));
858         _enum(toSet(a._enum(), a.e()));
859         collectionFormat(firstNonEmpty(a.collectionFormat(), a.cf()));
860         exclusiveMaximum(a.exclusiveMaximum() || a.emax());
861         exclusiveMinimum(a.exclusiveMinimum() || a.emin());
862         format(firstNonEmpty(a.format(), a.f()));
863         items(HttpPartSchema.toJsonMap(a.items()));
864         maximum(toNumber(a.maximum(), a.max()));
865         maxItems(firstNmo(a.maxItems(), a.maxi()));
866         maxLength(firstNmo(a.maxLength(), a.maxl()));
867         minimum(toNumber(a.minimum(), a.min()));
868         minItems(firstNmo(a.minItems(), a.mini()));
869         minLength(firstNmo(a.minLength(), a.minl()));
870         multipleOf(toNumber(a.multipleOf(), a.mo()));
871         pattern(firstNonEmpty(a.pattern(), a.p()));
872         type(firstNonEmpty(a.type(), a.t()));
873         uniqueItems(a.uniqueItems() || a.ui());         return this;
874      }
875
876      @SuppressWarnings("deprecation")
877      Builder apply(Schema a) {
878         _default(joinnlOrNull(a._default(), a.df()));
879         _enum(toSet(a._enum(), a.e()));
880         additionalProperties(HttpPartSchema.toJsonMap(a.additionalProperties()));
881         allowEmptyValue(a.allowEmptyValue() || a.aev());
882         collectionFormat(firstNonEmpty(a.collectionFormat(), a.cf()));
883
884         // Handle exclusiveMaximum with fallback from Draft 2020-12 to Draft 04
885         String exMaxVal = a.exclusiveMaximumValue();
886         if (isNotEmpty(exMaxVal)) {
887            exclusiveMaximumValue(toNumber(exMaxVal));
888         } else if (a.exclusiveMaximum() || a.emax()) {
889            exclusiveMaximum(true);
890         }
891
892         // Handle exclusiveMinimum with fallback from Draft 2020-12 to Draft 04
893         String exMinVal = a.exclusiveMinimumValue();
894         if (isNotEmpty(exMinVal)) {
895            exclusiveMinimumValue(toNumber(exMinVal));
896         } else if (a.exclusiveMinimum() || a.emin()) {
897            exclusiveMinimum(true);
898         }
899
900         format(firstNonEmpty(a.format(), a.f()));
901         items(a.items());
902         maximum(toNumber(a.maximum(), a.max()));
903         maxItems(firstNmo(a.maxItems(), a.maxi()));
904         maxLength(firstNmo(a.maxLength(), a.maxl()));
905         maxProperties(firstNmo(a.maxProperties(), a.maxp()));
906         minimum(toNumber(a.minimum(), a.min()));
907         minItems(firstNmo(a.minItems(), a.mini()));
908         minLength(firstNmo(a.minLength(), a.minl()));
909         minProperties(firstNmo(a.minProperties(), a.minp()));
910         multipleOf(toNumber(a.multipleOf(), a.mo()));
911         pattern(firstNonEmpty(a.pattern(), a.p()));
912         properties(HttpPartSchema.toJsonMap(a.properties()));
913         required(a.required() || a.r());
914         skipIfEmpty(a.skipIfEmpty() || a.sie());
915         type(firstNonEmpty(a.type(), a.t()));
916         uniqueItems(a.uniqueItems() || a.ui());
917
918         // JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 properties
919         _const(joinnlOrNull(a._const()));
920         examples(a.examples());
921         deprecated(a.deprecatedProperty());
922
923         return this;
924      }
925
926      Builder apply(HasQuery a) {
927         name(firstNonEmpty(a.name(), a.value()));
928         return this;
929      }
930
931      Builder apply(HasFormData a) {
932         name(firstNonEmpty(a.name(), a.value()));
933         return this;
934      }
935
936      Builder apply(JsonMap m) {
937         if (m != null && ! m.isEmpty()) {
938            _default(m.getString("default"));
939            _enum(HttpPartSchema.toSet(m.getString("enum")));
940            allowEmptyValue(m.getBoolean("allowEmptyValue"));
941            exclusiveMaximum(m.getBoolean("exclusiveMaximum"));
942            exclusiveMinimum(m.getBoolean("exclusiveMinimum"));
943            required(m.getBoolean("required"));
944            uniqueItems(m.getBoolean("uniqueItems"));
945            collectionFormat(m.getString("collectionFormat"));
946            type(m.getString("type"));
947            format(m.getString("format"));
948            pattern(m.getString("pattern"));
949            maximum(m.get("maximum", Number.class));
950            minimum(m.get("minimum", Number.class));
951            multipleOf(m.get("multipleOf", Number.class));
952            maxItems(m.get("maxItems", Long.class));
953            maxLength(m.get("maxLength", Long.class));
954            maxProperties(m.get("maxProperties", Long.class));
955            minItems(m.get("minItems", Long.class));
956            minLength(m.get("minLength", Long.class));
957            minProperties(m.get("minProperties", Long.class));
958
959            items(m.getMap("items"));
960            properties(m.getMap("properties"));
961            additionalProperties(m.getMap("additionalProperties"));
962
963            apply(m.getMap("schema", null));
964         }
965         return this;
966      }
967
968      /**
969       * Apply Jakarta Bean Validation constraints to this schema.
970       *
971       * <p>
972       * This method uses pure reflection to read constraint annotations, so no jakarta.validation-api
973       * dependency is required. The constraints are mapped to OpenAPI schema properties where applicable.
974       *
975       * <p>
976       * Supported constraints:
977       * <ul>
978       *    <li><c>@NotNull</c> → <c>required(true)</c>
979       *    <li><c>@Size</c> → <c>minLength/maxLength</c> or <c>minItems/maxItems</c>
980       *    <li><c>@Min</c> → <c>minimum</c>
981       *    <li><c>@Max</c> → <c>maximum</c>
982       *    <li><c>@DecimalMin</c> → <c>minimum + exclusiveMinimum</c>
983       *    <li><c>@DecimalMax</c> → <c>maximum + exclusiveMaximum</c>
984       *    <li><c>@Pattern</c> → <c>pattern</c>
985       *    <li><c>@Email</c> → <c>format("email")</c>
986       *    <li><c>@Positive</c> → <c>minimum(0) + exclusiveMinimum(true)</c>
987       *    <li><c>@PositiveOrZero</c> → <c>minimum(0)</c>
988       *    <li><c>@Negative</c> → <c>maximum(0) + exclusiveMaximum(true)</c>
989       *    <li><c>@NegativeOrZero</c> → <c>maximum(0)</c>
990       *    <li><c>@NotEmpty</c> → <c>required(true) + minLength(1)/minItems(1)</c>
991       *    <li><c>@NotBlank</c> → <c>required(true) + minLength(1) + pattern</c>
992       * </ul>
993       *
994       * @param a The Jakarta Validation constraint annotation.
995       * @return This object.
996       * @since 9.2.0
997       */
998      Builder applyJakartaValidation(Annotation a) {
999         String simpleName = a.annotationType().getSimpleName();
1000
1001         try {
1002            switch (simpleName) {
1003               case "NotNull":
1004                  required(true);
1005                  break;
1006               case "Size":
1007                  Integer min = getAnnotationValue(a, "min", Integer.class);
1008                  Integer max = getAnnotationValue(a, "max", Integer.class);
1009                  if (min != null && min > 0) {
1010                     minLength(min.longValue());
1011                     minItems(min.longValue());
1012                  }
1013                  if (max != null && max < Integer.MAX_VALUE) {
1014                     maxLength(max.longValue());
1015                     maxItems(max.longValue());
1016                  }
1017                  break;
1018               case "Min":
1019                  Long minValue = getAnnotationValue(a, "value", Long.class);
1020                  if (minValue != null)
1021                     minimum(minValue);
1022                  break;
1023               case "Max":
1024                  Long maxValue = getAnnotationValue(a, "value", Long.class);
1025                  if (maxValue != null)
1026                     maximum(maxValue);
1027                  break;
1028               case "Pattern":
1029                  String regexp = getAnnotationValue(a, "regexp", String.class);
1030                  if (regexp != null)
1031                     pattern(regexp);
1032                  break;
1033               case "Email":
1034                  format("email");
1035                  break;
1036               case "Positive":
1037                  minimum(0);
1038                  exclusiveMinimum(true);
1039                  break;
1040               case "PositiveOrZero":
1041                  minimum(0);
1042                  break;
1043               case "Negative":
1044                  maximum(0);
1045                  exclusiveMaximum(true);
1046                  break;
1047               case "NegativeOrZero":
1048                  maximum(0);
1049                  break;
1050               case "NotEmpty":
1051                  required(true);
1052                  minLength(1L);
1053                  minItems(1L);
1054                  break;
1055               case "NotBlank":
1056                  required(true);
1057                  minLength(1L);
1058                  pattern(".*\\S.*"); // Contains at least one non-whitespace character
1059                  break;
1060               case "DecimalMin":
1061                  String minVal = getAnnotationValue(a, "value", String.class);
1062                  Boolean minInclusive = getAnnotationValue(a, "inclusive", Boolean.class);
1063                  if (minVal != null) {
1064                     minimum(toNumber(minVal));
1065                     if (Boolean.FALSE.equals(minInclusive))
1066                        exclusiveMinimum(true);
1067                  }
1068                  break;
1069               case "DecimalMax":
1070                  String maxVal = getAnnotationValue(a, "value", String.class);
1071                  Boolean maxInclusive = getAnnotationValue(a, "inclusive", Boolean.class);
1072                  if (maxVal != null) {
1073                     maximum(toNumber(maxVal));
1074                     if (Boolean.FALSE.equals(maxInclusive))
1075                        exclusiveMaximum(true);
1076                  }
1077                  break;
1078               // Silently ignore other validation annotations we don't support yet
1079            }
1080         } catch (Exception e) {
1081            // If reflection fails, just skip this annotation - it's optional
1082         }
1083         return this;
1084      }
1085
1086      /**
1087       * Helper method to safely get annotation attribute values via reflection.
1088       *
1089       * <p>
1090       * This allows reading Jakarta Validation annotations without requiring them on the classpath.
1091       *
1092       * @param <T> The expected return type.
1093       * @param a The annotation to read from.
1094       * @param attributeName The attribute name to read.
1095       * @param type The expected type of the attribute value.
1096       * @return The attribute value, or <jk>null</jk> if not found or not of the expected type.
1097       */
1098      private <T> T getAnnotationValue(Annotation a, String attributeName, Class<T> type) {
1099         try {
1100            Method m = a.annotationType().getDeclaredMethod(attributeName);
1101            Object value = m.invoke(a);
1102            return type.isInstance(value) ? type.cast(value) : null;
1103         } catch (Exception e) {
1104            return null;
1105         }
1106      }
1107
1108      /**
1109       * <mk>name</mk> field.
1110       *
1111       * <p>
1112       * Applicable to the following Swagger schema objects:
1113       * <ul>
1114       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#parameterObject">Parameter</a>
1115       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#headerObject">Header</a>
1116       * </ul>
1117       *
1118       * @param value
1119       *    The new value for this property.
1120       * @return This object.
1121       */
1122      public Builder name(String value) {
1123         if (Utils.isNotEmpty(value))
1124            name = value;
1125         return this;
1126      }
1127
1128      /**
1129       * Synonym for {@link #name(String)}.
1130       *
1131       * @param value
1132       *    The new value for this property.
1133       * @return This object.
1134       */
1135      public Builder n(String value) {
1136         return name(value);
1137      }
1138
1139      /**
1140       * <mk>httpStatusCode</mk> key.
1141       *
1142       * <p>
1143       * Applicable to the following Swagger schema objects:
1144       * <ul>
1145       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#responsesObject">Responses</a>
1146       * </ul>
1147       *
1148       * @param value
1149       *    The new value for this property.
1150       *    <br>Ignored if <jk>null</jk> or an empty array.
1151       * @return This object.
1152       */
1153      public Builder codes(int[] value) {
1154         if (value != null && value.length != 0)
1155            for (int v : value)
1156               code(v);
1157         return this;
1158      }
1159
1160      /**
1161       * <mk>httpStatusCode</mk> key.
1162       *
1163       * <p>
1164       * Applicable to the following Swagger schema objects:
1165       * <ul>
1166       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#responsesObject">Responses</a>
1167       * </ul>
1168       *
1169       * @param value
1170       *    The new value for this property.
1171       *    <br>Ignored if value is <c>0</c>.
1172       * @return This object.
1173       */
1174      public Builder code(int value) {
1175         if (value != 0) {
1176            if (codes == null)
1177               codes = new TreeSet<>();
1178            codes.add(value);
1179         }
1180         return this;
1181      }
1182
1183      /**
1184       * <mk>required</mk> field.
1185       *
1186       * <p>
1187       * Determines whether the parameter is mandatory.
1188       *
1189       * <p>
1190       * Applicable to the following Swagger schema objects:
1191       * <ul>
1192       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#parameterObject">Parameter</a>
1193       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Schema</a>
1194       * </ul>
1195       *
1196       * @param value
1197       *    The new value for this property.
1198       *    <br>Ignored if value is <jk>null</jk>.
1199       * @return This object.
1200       */
1201      public Builder required(Boolean value) {
1202         required = resolve(value, required);
1203         return this;
1204      }
1205
1206      /**
1207       * Synonym for {@link #required(Boolean)}.
1208       *
1209       * @param value
1210       *    The new value for this property.
1211       * @return This object.
1212       */
1213      public Builder r(Boolean value) {
1214         return required(value);
1215      }
1216
1217      /**
1218       * <mk>required</mk> field.
1219       *
1220       * <p>
1221       * Determines whether the parameter is mandatory.
1222       *
1223       * <p>
1224       * Same as {@link #required(Boolean)} but takes in a boolean value as a string.
1225       *
1226       * @param value
1227       *    The new value for this property.
1228       *    <br>Ignored if value is <jk>null</jk> or empty.
1229       * @return This object.
1230       */
1231      public Builder required(String value) {
1232         required = resolve(value, required);
1233         return this;
1234      }
1235
1236      /**
1237       * Synonym for {@link #required(String)}.
1238       *
1239       * @param value
1240       *    The new value for this property.
1241       * @return This object.
1242       */
1243      public Builder r(String value) {
1244         return required(value);
1245      }
1246
1247      /**
1248       * <mk>required</mk> field.
1249       *
1250       * <p>
1251       * Shortcut for calling <code>required(<jk>true</jk>);</code>.
1252       *
1253       * @return This object.
1254       */
1255      public Builder required() {
1256         return required(true);
1257      }
1258
1259      /**
1260       * Synonym for {@link #required()}.
1261       *
1262       * @return This object.
1263       */
1264      public Builder r() {
1265         return required();
1266      }
1267
1268      /**
1269       * <mk>type</mk> field.
1270       *
1271       * <p>
1272       * The type of the parameter.
1273       *
1274       * <p>
1275       * If the type is not specified, it will be auto-detected based on the parameter class type.
1276       *
1277       * <p>
1278       * Applicable to the following Swagger schema objects:
1279       * <ul>
1280       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#parameterObject">Parameter</a>
1281       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Schema</a>
1282       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#itemsObject">Items</a>
1283       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#securitySchemeObject">SecurityScheme</a>
1284       * </ul>
1285       *
1286       * <ul class='values'>
1287       *    <li>
1288       *       <js>"string"</js>
1289       *       <br>Parameter must be a string or a POJO convertible from a string.
1290       *    <li>
1291       *       <js>"number"</js>
1292       *       <br>Parameter must be a number primitive or number object.
1293       *       <br>If parameter is <c>Object</c>, creates either a <c>Float</c> or <c>Double</c> depending on the size of the number.
1294       *    <li>
1295       *       <js>"integer"</js>
1296       *       <br>Parameter must be a integer/long primitive or integer/long object.
1297       *       <br>If parameter is <c>Object</c>, creates either a <c>Short</c>, <c>Integer</c>, or <c>Long</c> depending on the size of the number.
1298       *    <li>
1299       *       <js>"boolean"</js>
1300       *       <br>Parameter must be a boolean primitive or object.
1301       *    <li>
1302       *       <js>"array"</js>
1303       *       <br>Parameter must be an array or collection.
1304       *       <br>Elements must be strings or POJOs convertible from strings.
1305       *       <br>If parameter is <c>Object</c>, creates an {@link JsonList}.
1306       *    <li>
1307       *       <js>"object"</js>
1308       *       <br>Parameter must be a map or bean.
1309       *       <br>If parameter is <c>Object</c>, creates an {@link JsonMap}.
1310       *       <br>Note that this is an extension of the OpenAPI schema as Juneau allows for arbitrarily-complex POJOs to be serialized as HTTP parts.
1311       *    <li>
1312       *       <js>"file"</js>
1313       *       <br>This type is currently not supported.
1314       * </ul>
1315       *
1316       * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
1317       *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification#dataTypes">Swagger Data Types</a>
1318       * </ul>
1319       *
1320       * @param value
1321       *    The new value for this property.
1322       *    <br>Ignored if value is <jk>null</jk> or empty.
1323       * @return This object.
1324       */
1325      public Builder type(String value) {
1326         try {
1327            if (Utils.isNotEmpty(value))
1328               type = HttpPartDataType.fromString(value);
1329         } catch (Exception e) {
1330            throw new ContextRuntimeException("Invalid value ''{0}'' passed in as type value.  Valid values: {1}", value, HttpPartDataType.values());
1331         }
1332         return this;
1333      }
1334
1335      /**
1336       * Synonym for {@link #type(String)}.
1337       *
1338       * @param value
1339       *    The new value for this property.
1340       * @return This object.
1341       */
1342      public Builder t(String value) {
1343         return type(value);
1344      }

1426      /**
1427       * <mk>type</mk> field.
1428       *
1429       * <p>
1430       * The type of the parameter.
1431       *
1432       * <p>
1433       * If the type is not specified, it will be auto-detected based on the parameter class type.
1434       *
1435       * <p>
1436       * Applicable to the following Swagger schema objects:
1437       * <ul>
1438       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#parameterObject">Parameter</a>
1439       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Schema</a>
1440       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#itemsObject">Items</a>
1441       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#securitySchemeObject">SecurityScheme</a>
1442       * </ul>
1443       *
1444       * <ul class='values javatree'>
1445       *    <li class='jc'>{@link HttpPartDataType}
1446       *    <ul>
1447       *       <li class='jf'>
1448       *          {@link HttpPartDataType#STRING STRING}
1449       *          <br>Parameter must be a string or a POJO convertible from a string.
1450       *          <li>
1451       *          {@link HttpPartDataType#NUMBER NUMBER}
1452       *          <br>Parameter must be a number primitive or number object.
1453       *          <br>If parameter is <c>Object</c>, creates either a <c>Float</c> or <c>Double</c> depending on the size of the number.
1454       *       <li class='jf'>
1455       *          {@link HttpPartDataType#INTEGER INTEGER}
1456       *          <br>Parameter must be a integer/long primitive or integer/long object.
1457       *          <br>If parameter is <c>Object</c>, creates either a <c>Short</c>, <c>Integer</c>, or <c>Long</c> depending on the size of the number.
1458       *       <li class='jf'>
1459       *          {@link HttpPartDataType#BOOLEAN BOOLEAN}
1460       *          <br>Parameter must be a boolean primitive or object.
1461       *       <li class='jf'>
1462       *          {@link HttpPartDataType#ARRAY ARRAY}
1463       *          <br>Parameter must be an array or collection.
1464       *          <br>Elements must be strings or POJOs convertible from strings.
1465       *          <br>If parameter is <c>Object</c>, creates an {@link JsonList}.
1466       *       <li class='jf'>
1467       *          {@link HttpPartDataType#OBJECT OBJECT}
1468       *          <br>Parameter must be a map or bean.
1469       *          <br>If parameter is <c>Object</c>, creates an {@link JsonMap}.
1470       *          <br>Note that this is an extension of the OpenAPI schema as Juneau allows for arbitrarily-complex POJOs to be serialized as HTTP parts.
1471       *       <li class='jf'>
1472       *          {@link HttpPartDataType#FILE FILE}
1473       *          <br>This type is currently not supported.
1474       *    </ul>
1475       * </ul>
1476       *
1477       * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
1478       *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification#dataTypes">Swagger Data Types</a>
1479       * </ul>

1481       * @param value
1482       *    The new value for this property.
1483       * @return This object.
1484       */

1501      /**
1502       * <mk>format</mk> field.
1503       *
1504       * <p>
1505       * The extending format for the previously mentioned <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#parameterType">parameter type</a>.
1506       *
1507       * <p>
1508       * Applicable to the following Swagger schema objects:
1509       * <ul>
1510       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#parameterObject">Parameter</a>
1511       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Schema</a>
1512       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#itemsObject">Items</a>
1513       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#headerObject">Header</a>
1514       * </ul>
1515       *
1516       * <ul class='values'>
1517       *    <li>
1518       *       <js>"int32"</js> - Signed 32 bits.
1519       *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"integer"</js>.
1520       *    <li>
1521       *       <js>"int64"</js> - Signed 64 bits.
1522       *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"integer"</js>.
1523       *    <li>
1524       *       <js>"float"</js> - 32-bit floating point number.
1525       *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"number"</js>.
1526       *    <li>
1527       *       <js>"double"</js> - 64-bit floating point number.
1528       *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"number"</js>.
1529       *    <li>
1530       *       <js>"byte"</js> - BASE-64 encoded characters.
1531       *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"string"</js>.
1532       *       <br>Parameters of type POJO convertible from string are converted after the string has been decoded.
1533       *    <li>
1534       *       <js>"binary"</js> - Hexadecimal encoded octets (e.g. <js>"00FF"</js>).
1535       *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"string"</js>.
1536       *       <br>Parameters of type POJO convertible from string are converted after the string has been decoded.
1537       *    <li>
1538       *       <js>"binary-spaced"</js> - Hexadecimal encoded octets, spaced (e.g. <js>"00 FF"</js>).
1539       *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"string"</js>.
1540       *       <br>Parameters of type POJO convertible from string are converted after the string has been decoded.
1541       *    <li>
1542       *       <js>"date"</js> - An <a href='http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14'>RFC3339 full-date</a>.
1543       *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"string"</js>.
1544       *    <li>
1545       *       <js>"date-time"</js> - An <a href='http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14'>RFC3339 date-time</a>.
1546       *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"string"</js>.
1547       *    <li>
1548       *       <js>"password"</js> - Used to hint UIs the input needs to be obscured.
1549       *       <br>This format does not affect the serialization or parsing of the parameter.
1550       *    <li>
1551       *       <js>"uon"</js> - UON notation (e.g. <js>"(foo=bar,baz=@(qux,123))"</js>).
1552       *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"object"</js>.
1553       *       <br>If not specified, then the input is interpreted as plain-text and is converted to a POJO directly.
1554       * </ul>
1555       *
1556       * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
1557       *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>
1558       * </ul>
1559       *
1560       * @param value
1561       *    The new value for this property.
1562       *    <br>Ignored if value is <jk>null</jk> or an empty string.
1563       * @return This object.
1564       */
1565      public Builder format(String value) {
1566         try {
1567            if (Utils.isNotEmpty(value))
1568               format = HttpPartFormat.fromString(value);
1569         } catch (Exception e) {
1570            throw new ContextRuntimeException("Invalid value ''{0}'' passed in as format value.  Valid values: {1}", value, HttpPartFormat.values());
1571         }
1572         return this;
1573      }
1574
1575      /**
1576       * Synonym for {@link #format(String)}.
1577       *
1578       * @param value
1579       *    The new value for this property.
1580       * @return This object.
1581       */
1582      public Builder f(String value) {
1583         return format(value);
1584      }

1586      /**
1587       * <mk>format</mk> field.
1588       *
1589       * <p>
1590       * The extending format for the previously mentioned <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#parameterType">parameter type</a>.
1591       *
1592       * <p>
1593       * Applicable to the following Swagger schema objects:
1594       * <ul>
1595       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#parameterObject">Parameter</a>
1596       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Schema</a>
1597       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#itemsObject">Items</a>
1598       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#headerObject">Header</a>
1599       * </ul>
1600       *
1601       * <ul class='values javatree'>
1602       *    <ul class='jc'>{@link HttpPartFormat}
1603       *    <ul>
1604       *       <li class='jf'>
1605       *          {@link HttpPartFormat#INT32 INT32} - Signed 32 bits.
1606       *          <br>Only valid with type <js>"integer"</js>.
1607       *       <li class='jf'>
1608       *          {@link HttpPartFormat#INT64 INT64} - Signed 64 bits.
1609       *          <br>Only valid with type <js>"integer"</js>.
1610       *       <li class='jf'>
1611       *          {@link HttpPartFormat#FLOAT FLOAT} - 32-bit floating point number.
1612       *          <br>Only valid with type <js>"number"</js>.
1613       *       <li class='jf'>
1614       *          {@link HttpPartFormat#DOUBLE DOUBLE} - 64-bit floating point number.
1615       *          <br>Only valid with type <js>"number"</js>.
1616       *       <li class='jf'>
1617       *          {@link HttpPartFormat#BYTE BYTE} - BASE-64 encoded characters.
1618       *          <br>Only valid with type <js>"string"</js>.
1619       *          <br>Parameters of type POJO convertible from string are converted after the string has been decoded.
1620       *       <li class='jf'>

1622       *          <br>Only valid with type <js>"string"</js>.
1623       *          <br>Parameters of type POJO convertible from string are converted after the string has been decoded.
1624       *       <li class='jf'>
1625       *          {@link HttpPartFormat#BINARY_SPACED BINARY_SPACED} - Hexadecimal encoded octets, spaced (e.g. <js>"00 FF"</js>).
1626       *          <br>Only valid with type <js>"string"</js>.
1627       *          <br>Parameters of type POJO convertible from string are converted after the string has been decoded.
1628       *       <li class='jf'>
1629       *          {@link HttpPartFormat#DATE DATE} - An <a href='http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14'>RFC3339 full-date</a>.
1630       *          <br>Only valid with type <js>"string"</js>.
1631       *       <li class='jf'>
1632       *          {@link HttpPartFormat#DATE_TIME DATE_TIME} - An <a href='http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14'>RFC3339 date-time</a>.
1633       *          <br>Only valid with type <js>"string"</js>.
1634       *       <li class='jf'>
1635       *          {@link HttpPartFormat#PASSWORD PASSWORD} - Used to hint UIs the input needs to be obscured.
1636       *          <br>This format does not affect the serialization or parsing of the parameter.
1637       *       <li class='jf'>
1638       *          {@link HttpPartFormat#UON UON} - UON notation (e.g. <js>"(foo=bar,baz=@(qux,123))"</js>).
1639       *          <br>Only valid with type <js>"object"</js>.
1640       *          <br>If not specified, then the input is interpreted as plain-text and is converted to a POJO directly.
1641       *    </ul>
1642       * </ul>
1643       *
1644       * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>

1651       */

1654         return this;
1655      }

1788      /**
1789       * <mk>allowEmptyValue</mk> field.
1790       *
1791       * <p>
1792       * Sets the ability to pass empty-valued parameters.
1793       * <br>This is valid only for either query or formData parameters and allows you to send a parameter with a name only or an empty value.
1794       * <br>The default value is <jk>false</jk>.
1795       *
1796       * <p>
1797       * Applicable to the following Swagger schema objects:
1798       * <ul>
1799       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#parameterObject">Parameter</a>
1800       * </ul>
1801       *
1802       * @param value
1803       *    The new value for this property.
1804       *    <br>Ignored if value is <jk>null</jk>.
1805       * @return This object.
1806       */
1807      public Builder allowEmptyValue(Boolean value) {
1808         allowEmptyValue = resolve(value, allowEmptyValue);
1809         return this;
1810      }
1811

1813       * Synonym for {@link #allowEmptyValue(Boolean)}.

1871      /**
1872       * <mk>items</mk> field.
1873       *
1874       * <p>
1875       * Describes the type of items in the array.
1876       * <p>
1877       * Required if <c>type</c> is <js>"array"</js>.
1878       * <br>Can only be used if <c>type</c> is <js>"array"</js>.
1879       *
1880       * <p>
1881       * Applicable to the following Swagger schema objects:
1882       * <ul>
1883       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#parameterObject">Parameter</a>

1886       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#headerObject">Header</a>
1887       * </ul>

1970      /**
1971       * <mk>collectionFormat</mk> field.
1972       *
1973       * <p>
1974       * Determines the format of the array if <c>type</c> <js>"array"</js> is used.
1975       * <br>Can only be used if <c>type</c> is <js>"array"</js>.
1976       *
1977       * <p>
1978       * Applicable to the following Swagger schema objects:
1979       * <ul>
1980       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#parameterObject">Parameter</a>
1981       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#itemsObject">Items</a>
1982       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#headerObject">Header</a>
1983       * </ul>
1984       *
1985       * <p>
1986       * Note that for collections/arrays parameters with POJO element types, the input is broken into a string array before being converted into POJO elements.
1987       *
1988       * <ul class='values'>
1989       *    <li>
1990       *       <js>"csv"</js> (default) - Comma-separated values (e.g. <js>"foo,bar"</js>).
1991       *    <li>
1992       *       <js>"ssv"</js> - Space-separated values (e.g. <js>"foo bar"</js>).
1993       *    <li>
1994       *       <js>"tsv"</js> - Tab-separated values (e.g. <js>"foo\tbar"</js>).
1995       *    <li>
1996       *       <js>"pipes</js> - Pipe-separated values (e.g. <js>"foo|bar"</js>).
1997       *    <li>
1998       *       <js>"multi"</js> - Corresponds to multiple parameter instances instead of multiple values for a single instance (e.g. <js>"foo=bar&amp;foo=baz"</js>).
1999       *    <li>
2000       *       <js>"uon"</js> - UON notation (e.g. <js>"@(foo,bar)"</js>).
2001       *    <li>
2002       * </ul>
2003       *
2004       * @param value
2005       *    The new value for this property.
2006       *    <br>Ignored if value is <jk>null</jk> or empty.
2007       * @return This object.
2008       */
2009      public Builder collectionFormat(String value) {
2010         try {
2011            if (Utils.isNotEmpty(value))
2012               this.collectionFormat = HttpPartCollectionFormat.fromString(value);
2013         } catch (Exception e) {
2014            throw new ContextRuntimeException("Invalid value ''{0}'' passed in as collectionFormat value.  Valid values: {1}", value, HttpPartCollectionFormat.values());
2015         }
2016         return this;
2017      }

2022       * @param value
2023       *    The new value for this property.
2024       * @return This object.
2025       */
2026      public Builder cf(String value) {
2027         return collectionFormat(value);
2028      }

2030      /**
2031       * <mk>collectionFormat</mk> field.
2032       *
2033       * <p>
2034       * Determines the format of the array if <c>type</c> <js>"array"</js> is used.
2035       * <br>Can only be used if <c>type</c> is <js>"array"</js>.
2036       *
2037       * <p>
2038       * Applicable to the following Swagger schema objects:
2039       * <ul>
2040       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#parameterObject">Parameter</a>
2041       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#itemsObject">Items</a>
2042       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#headerObject">Header</a>
2043       * </ul>
2044       *
2045       * <p>
2046       * Note that for collections/arrays parameters with POJO element types, the input is broken into a string array before being converted into POJO elements.
2047       *
2048       * <ul class='values javatree'>
2049       *    <ul class='jc'>{@link HttpPartCollectionFormat}
2050       *    <ul>
2051       *       <li>
2052       *          {@link HttpPartCollectionFormat#CSV CSV} (default) - Comma-separated values (e.g. <js>"foo,bar"</js>).
2053       *       <li>
2054       *          {@link HttpPartCollectionFormat#SSV SSV} - Space-separated values (e.g. <js>"foo bar"</js>).
2055       *       <li>
2056       *          {@link HttpPartCollectionFormat#TSV TSV} - Tab-separated values (e.g. <js>"foo\tbar"</js>).
2057       *       <li>
2058       *          {@link HttpPartCollectionFormat#PIPES PIPES} - Pipe-separated values (e.g. <js>"foo|bar"</js>).
2059       *       <li>
2060       *          {@link HttpPartCollectionFormat#MULTI MULTI} - Corresponds to multiple parameter instances instead of multiple values for a single instance (e.g. <js>"foo=bar&amp;foo=baz"</js>).
2061       *       <li>
2062       *          {@link HttpPartCollectionFormat#UONC UONC} - UON collection notation (e.g. <js>"@(foo,bar)"</js>).
2063       *    </ul>
2064       * </ul>
2065       *
2066       * @param value
2067       *    The new value for this property.

2577      /**
2578       * <mk>pattern</mk> field.
2579       *
2580       * <p>
2581       * A string input is valid if it matches the specified regular expression pattern.
2582       *
2583       * <p>
2584       * Only allowed for the following types: <js>"string"</js>.
2585       *
2586       * <p>
2587       * Applicable to the following Swagger schema objects:
2588       * <ul>
2589       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#parameterObject">Parameter</a>
2590       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Schema</a>
2591       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#itemsObject">Items</a>
2592       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#headerObject">Header</a>
2593       * </ul>
2594       *
2595       * @param value
2596       *    The new value for this property.
2597       *    <br>Ignored if value is <jk>null</jk> or empty.
2598       * @return This object.
2599       */
2600      public Builder pattern(String value) {
2601         try {
2602            if (Utils.isNotEmpty(value))
2603               this.pattern = Pattern.compile(value);
2604         } catch (Exception e) {
2605            throw new ContextRuntimeException(e, "Invalid value {0} passed in as pattern value.  Must be a valid regular expression.", value);
2606         }
2607         return this;
2608      }
2609
2610      /**
2611       * Synonym for {@link #pattern(String)}.
2612       *
2613       * @param value
2614       *    The new value for this property.
2615       * @return This object.
2616       */
2617      public Builder p(String value) {
2618         return pattern(value);
2619      }

3136      /**
3137       * <mk>properties</mk> field.
3138       *
3139       * <p>
3140       * Applicable to the following Swagger schema objects:
3141       * <ul>
3142       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Schema</a>
3143       * </ul>
3144       *
3145       * @param key
3146       * The property name.
3147       * @param value
3148       *    The new value for this property.
3149       *    <br>Ignored if value is <jk>null</jk>.
3150       * @return This object.
3151       */
3152      public Builder property(String key, Builder value) {
3153         if ( key != null && value != null) {
3154            if (properties == null)
3155               properties = map();
3156            properties.put(key, value);
3157         }
3158         return this;
3159      }
3160

3180               properties = map();

3210       * Applicable to the following Swagger schema objects:
3211       * <ul>
3212       *    <li><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Schema</a>
3213       * </ul>
3214       *
3215       * @param key
3216       * The property name.
3217       * @param value
3218       *    The new value for this property.
3219       *    <br>Ignored if value is <jk>null</jk>.
3220       * @return This object.
3221       */
3222      public Builder p(String key, HttpPartSchema value) {
3223         return property(key, value);
3224      }

3227         if (value != null)
3228            value.forEach((k,v) -> property(k, HttpPartSchema.create().apply((JsonMap)v)));
3229         return this;

3438      /**
3439       * Disables Swagger schema usage validation checking.
3440       *
3441       * @param value Specify <jk>true</jk> to prevent {@link ContextRuntimeException} from being thrown if invalid Swagger usage was detected.
3442       * @return This object.
3443       */
3444      public Builder noValidate(Boolean value) {
3445         if (value != null)
3446            this.noValidate = value;
3447         return this;
3448      }
3449
3450      /**
3451       * Disables Swagger schema usage validation checking.
3452       *
3453       * <p>
3454       * Shortcut for calling <code>noValidate(<jk>true</jk>);</code>.
3455       *
3456       * @return This object.
3457       */
3458      public Builder noValidate() {
3459         return noValidate(true);
3460      }
3461
3462      private Boolean resolve(String newValue, Boolean oldValue) {
3463         return Utils.isEmpty(newValue) ? oldValue : Boolean.valueOf(newValue);
3464      }
3465
3466      private Boolean resolve(Boolean newValue, Boolean oldValue) {
3467         return newValue == null ? oldValue : newValue;
3468      }
3469
3470      private Long resolve(String newValue, Long oldValue) {
3471         return Utils.isEmpty(newValue) ? oldValue : Long.parseLong(newValue);
3472      }
3473
3474      private Long resolve(Long newValue, Long oldValue) {
3475         return (newValue == null || newValue == -1) ? oldValue : newValue;
3476      }
3477
3478      private Set<String> toSet(String[]...s) {
3479         return HttpPartSchema.toSet(s);
3480      }
3481
3482      private Number toNumber(String...s) {
3483         return HttpPartSchema.toNumber(s);
3484      }
3485
3486      private Long firstNmo(Long...l) {
3487         for (Long ll : l)
3488            if (ll != null && ll != -1)
3489               return ll;
3490         return null;
3491      }
3492
3493      private String joinnlOrNull(String[]...s) {
3494         for (String[] ss : s)
3495            if (ss.length > 0)
3496               return Utils.joinnl(ss);
3497         return null;
3498      }
3499   }
3500
3501   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3502   // Instance
3503   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3504
3505   final String name;
3506   final String _default;
3507   final Set<String> _enum;
3508   final Map<String,HttpPartSchema> properties;
3509   final boolean allowEmptyValue, exclusiveMaximum, exclusiveMinimum, required, uniqueItems, skipIfEmpty;
3510   final HttpPartCollectionFormat collectionFormat;
3511   final HttpPartDataType type;
3512   final HttpPartFormat format;
3513   final Pattern pattern;
3514   final HttpPartSchema items, additionalProperties;
3515   final Number maximum, minimum, multipleOf;
3516   final Long maxLength, minLength, maxItems, minItems, maxProperties, minProperties;
3517   final Class<? extends HttpPartParser> parser;
3518   final Class<? extends HttpPartSerializer> serializer;
3519   final ClassMeta<?> parsedType;
3520   // JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 fields
3521   final String _const;
3522   final String[] examples;
3523   final boolean deprecated;
3524   final Number exclusiveMaximumValue, exclusiveMinimumValue;
3525
3526   HttpPartSchema(Builder b) {
3527      this.name = b.name;
3528      this._default = b._default;
3529      this._enum = copy(b._enum);
3530      this.properties = build(b.properties, b.noValidate);
3531      this.allowEmptyValue = resolve(b.allowEmptyValue);
3532      this.exclusiveMaximum = resolve(b.exclusiveMaximum);
3533      this.exclusiveMinimum = resolve(b.exclusiveMinimum);
3534      this.required = resolve(b.required);
3535      this.uniqueItems = resolve(b.uniqueItems);
3536      this.skipIfEmpty = resolve(b.skipIfEmpty);
3537      this.collectionFormat = b.collectionFormat;
3538      this.type = b.type;
3539      this.format = b.format;
3540      this.pattern = b.pattern;
3541      this.items = build(b.items, b.noValidate);
3542      this.additionalProperties = build(b.additionalProperties, b.noValidate);
3543      this.maximum = b.maximum;
3544      this.minimum = b.minimum;
3545      this.multipleOf = b.multipleOf;
3546      this.maxItems = b.maxItems;
3547      this.maxLength = b.maxLength;
3548      this.maxProperties = b.maxProperties;
3549      this.minItems = b.minItems;
3550      this.minLength = b.minLength;
3551      this.minProperties = b.minProperties;
3552      this.parser = b.parser;
3553      this.serializer = b.serializer;
3554      // JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 fields
3555      this._const = b._const;
3556      this.examples = b.examples;
3557      this.deprecated = resolve(b.deprecated);
3558      this.exclusiveMaximumValue = b.exclusiveMaximumValue;
3559      this.exclusiveMinimumValue = b.exclusiveMinimumValue;
3560
3561      // Calculate parse type
3562      Class<?> parsedType = Object.class;
3563      if (type == ARRAY) {
3564         if (items != null)
3565            parsedType = Array.newInstance(items.parsedType.getInnerClass(), 0).getClass();
3566      } else if (type == BOOLEAN) {
3567         parsedType = Boolean.class;
3568      } else if (type == INTEGER) {
3569         if (format == INT64)
3570            parsedType = Long.class;
3571         else
3572            parsedType = Integer.class;
3573      } else if (type == NUMBER) {
3574         if (format == DOUBLE)
3575            parsedType = Double.class;
3576         else
3577            parsedType = Float.class;
3578      } else if (type == STRING) {
3579         if (format == BYTE || format == BINARY || format == BINARY_SPACED)
3580            parsedType = byte[].class;
3581         else if (format == DATE || format == DATE_TIME)
3582            parsedType = Calendar.class;
3583         else
3584            parsedType = String.class;
3585      }
3586      this.parsedType = BeanContext.DEFAULT.getClassMeta(parsedType);
3587
3588      if (b.noValidate)
3589         return;
3590
3591      // Validation.
3592      List<String> errors = Utils.list();
3593      ListBuilder<String> notAllowed = listBuilder(String.class);
3594      boolean invalidFormat = false;
3595      switch (type) {
3596         case STRING: {
3597            notAllowed
3598               .addIf(properties != null, "properties")
3599               .addIf(additionalProperties != null, "additionalProperties")
3600               .addIf(exclusiveMaximum, "exclusiveMaximum")
3601               .addIf(exclusiveMinimum, "exclusiveMinimum")
3602               .addIf(uniqueItems, "uniqueItems")
3603               .addIf(collectionFormat != HttpPartCollectionFormat.NO_COLLECTION_FORMAT, "collectionFormat")
3604               .addIf(items != null, "items")
3605               .addIf(maximum != null, "maximum")
3606               .addIf(minimum != null, "minimum")
3607               .addIf(multipleOf != null, "multipleOf")
3608               .addIf(maxItems != null, "maxItems")
3609               .addIf(minItems != null, "minItems")
3610               .addIf(minProperties != null, "minProperties");
3611            invalidFormat = ! format.isOneOf(HttpPartFormat.BYTE, HttpPartFormat.BINARY, HttpPartFormat.BINARY_SPACED, HttpPartFormat.DATE, HttpPartFormat.DATE_TIME, HttpPartFormat.PASSWORD, HttpPartFormat.UON, HttpPartFormat.NO_FORMAT);
3612            break;
3613         }
3614         case ARRAY: {
3615            notAllowed.addIf(properties != null, "properties")
3616               .addIf(additionalProperties != null, "additionalProperties")
3617               .addIf(exclusiveMaximum, "exclusiveMaximum")
3618               .addIf(exclusiveMinimum, "exclusiveMinimum")
3619               .addIf(pattern != null, "pattern")
3620               .addIf(maximum != null, "maximum")
3621               .addIf(minimum != null, "minimum")
3622               .addIf(multipleOf != null, "multipleOf")
3623               .addIf(maxLength != null, "maxLength")
3624               .addIf(minLength != null, "minLength")
3625               .addIf(maxProperties != null, "maxProperties")
3626               .addIf(minProperties != null, "minProperties");
3627            invalidFormat = ! format.isOneOf(HttpPartFormat.NO_FORMAT, HttpPartFormat.UON);
3628            break;
3629         }
3630         case BOOLEAN: {
3631            notAllowed.addIf(! _enum.isEmpty(), "_enum")
3632               .addIf(properties != null, "properties")
3633               .addIf(additionalProperties != null, "additionalProperties")
3634               .addIf(exclusiveMaximum, "exclusiveMaximum")
3635               .addIf(exclusiveMinimum, "exclusiveMinimum")
3636               .addIf(uniqueItems, "uniqueItems")
3637               .addIf(collectionFormat != HttpPartCollectionFormat.NO_COLLECTION_FORMAT, "collectionFormat")
3638               .addIf(pattern != null, "pattern")
3639               .addIf(items != null, "items")
3640               .addIf(maximum != null, "maximum")
3641               .addIf(minimum != null, "minimum")
3642               .addIf(multipleOf != null, "multipleOf")
3643               .addIf(maxItems != null, "maxItems")
3644               .addIf(maxLength != null, "maxLength")
3645               .addIf(maxProperties != null, "maxProperties")
3646               .addIf(minItems != null, "minItems")
3647               .addIf(minLength != null, "minLength")
3648               .addIf(minProperties != null, "minProperties");
3649            invalidFormat = ! format.isOneOf(HttpPartFormat.NO_FORMAT, HttpPartFormat.UON);
3650            break;
3651         }
3652         case FILE: {
3653            break;
3654         }
3655         case INTEGER: {
3656            notAllowed.addIf(properties != null, "properties")
3657               .addIf(additionalProperties != null, "additionalProperties")
3658               .addIf(uniqueItems, "uniqueItems")
3659               .addIf(collectionFormat != HttpPartCollectionFormat.NO_COLLECTION_FORMAT, "collectionFormat")
3660               .addIf(pattern != null, "pattern")
3661               .addIf(items != null, "items")
3662               .addIf(maxItems != null, "maxItems")
3663               .addIf(maxLength != null, "maxLength")
3664               .addIf(maxProperties != null, "maxProperties")
3665               .addIf(minItems != null, "minItems")
3666               .addIf(minLength != null, "minLength")
3667               .addIf(minProperties != null, "minProperties");
3668            invalidFormat = ! format.isOneOf(HttpPartFormat.NO_FORMAT, HttpPartFormat.UON, HttpPartFormat.INT32, HttpPartFormat.INT64);
3669            break;
3670         }
3671         case NUMBER: {
3672            notAllowed.addIf(properties != null, "properties")
3673               .addIf(additionalProperties != null, "additionalProperties")
3674               .addIf(uniqueItems, "uniqueItems")
3675               .addIf(collectionFormat != HttpPartCollectionFormat.NO_COLLECTION_FORMAT, "collectionFormat")
3676               .addIf(pattern != null, "pattern")
3677               .addIf(items != null, "items")
3678               .addIf(maxItems != null, "maxItems")
3679               .addIf(maxLength != null, "maxLength")
3680               .addIf(maxProperties != null, "maxProperties")
3681               .addIf(minItems != null, "minItems")
3682               .addIf(minLength != null, "minLength")
3683               .addIf(minProperties != null, "minProperties");
3684            invalidFormat = ! format.isOneOf(HttpPartFormat.NO_FORMAT, HttpPartFormat.UON, HttpPartFormat.FLOAT, HttpPartFormat.DOUBLE);
3685            break;
3686         }
3687         case OBJECT: {
3688            notAllowed.addIf(exclusiveMaximum, "exclusiveMaximum")
3689               .addIf(exclusiveMinimum, "exclusiveMinimum")
3690               .addIf(uniqueItems, "uniqueItems")
3691               .addIf(pattern != null, "pattern")
3692               .addIf(items != null, "items")
3693               .addIf(maximum != null, "maximum")
3694               .addIf(minimum != null, "minimum")
3695               .addIf(multipleOf != null, "multipleOf")
3696               .addIf(maxItems != null, "maxItems")
3697               .addIf(maxLength != null, "maxLength")
3698               .addIf(minItems != null, "minItems")
3699               .addIf(minLength != null, "minLength");
3700            invalidFormat = ! format.isOneOf(HttpPartFormat.NO_FORMAT);
3701            break;
3702         }
3703         default:
3704            break;
3705      }
3706
3707      List<String> notAllowed2 = notAllowed.build();
3708      if (! notAllowed2.isEmpty())
3709         errors.add("Attributes not allow for type='"+type+"': " + Utils.join(notAllowed2, ","));
3710      if (invalidFormat)
3711         errors.add("Invalid format for type='"+type+"': '"+format+"'");
3712      if (exclusiveMaximum && maximum == null)
3713         errors.add("Cannot specify exclusiveMaximum with maximum.");
3714      if (exclusiveMinimum && minimum == null)
3715         errors.add("Cannot specify exclusiveMinimum with minimum.");
3716      if (required && _default != null)
3717         errors.add("Cannot specify a default value on a required value.");
3718      if (minLength != null && maxLength != null && maxLength < minLength)
3719         errors.add("maxLength cannot be less than minLength.");
3720      if (minimum != null && maximum != null && maximum.doubleValue() < minimum.doubleValue())
3721         errors.add("maximum cannot be less than minimum.");
3722      if (minItems != null && maxItems != null && maxItems < minItems)
3723         errors.add("maxItems cannot be less than minItems.");
3724      if (minProperties != null && maxProperties != null && maxProperties < minProperties)
3725         errors.add("maxProperties cannot be less than minProperties.");
3726      if (minLength != null && minLength < 0)
3727         errors.add("minLength cannot be less than zero.");
3728      if (maxLength != null && maxLength < 0)
3729         errors.add("maxLength cannot be less than zero.");
3730      if (minItems != null && minItems < 0)
3731         errors.add("minItems cannot be less than zero.");
3732      if (maxItems != null && maxItems < 0)
3733         errors.add("maxItems cannot be less than zero.");
3734      if (minProperties != null && minProperties < 0)
3735         errors.add("minProperties cannot be less than zero.");
3736      if (maxProperties != null && maxProperties < 0)
3737         errors.add("maxProperties cannot be less than zero.");
3738      if (type == ARRAY && items != null && items.getType() == OBJECT && (format != UON && format != HttpPartFormat.NO_FORMAT))
3739         errors.add("Cannot define an array of objects unless array format is 'uon'.");
3740
3741      if (! errors.isEmpty())
3742         throw new ContextRuntimeException("Schema specification errors: \n\t" + Utils.join(errors, "\n\t"), new Object[0]);
3743   }

3745   /**
3746    * Returns the default parsed type for this schema.
3747    *
3748    * @return The default parsed type for this schema.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
3749    */
3750   public ClassMeta<?> getParsedType() {
3751      return parsedType;
3752   }
3753
3754   /**
3755    * Returns the name of the object described by this schema, for example the query or form parameter name.
3756    *
3757    * @return The name, or <jk>null</jk> if not specified.
3758    * @see HttpPartSchema.Builder#name(String)
3759    */
3760   public String getName() {
3761      return name;
3762   }
3763
3764   /**
3765    * Returns the <c>type</c> field of this schema.
3766    *
3767    * @return The <c>type</c> field of this schema, or <jk>null</jk> if not specified.
3768    * @see HttpPartSchema.Builder#type(String)
3769    */
3770   public HttpPartDataType getType() {
3771      return type;
3772   }
3773
3774   /**
3775    * Returns the <c>type</c> field of this schema.
3776    *
3777    * @param cm
3778    *    The class meta of the object.
3779    *    <br>Used to auto-detect the type if the type was not specified.
3780    * @return The format field of this schema, or <jk>null</jk> if not specified.
3781    * @see HttpPartSchema.Builder#format(String)
3782    */
3783   public HttpPartDataType getType(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
3784      if (type != HttpPartDataType.NO_TYPE)
3785         return type;
3786      if (cm.isTemporal() || cm.isDateOrCalendar())
3787         return HttpPartDataType.STRING;
3788      if (cm.isNumber()) {
3789         if (cm.isDecimal())
3790            return HttpPartDataType.NUMBER;
3791         return HttpPartDataType.INTEGER;
3792      }
3793      if (cm.isBoolean())
3794         return HttpPartDataType.BOOLEAN;
3795      if (cm.isMapOrBean())
3796         return HttpPartDataType.OBJECT;
3797      if (cm.isCollectionOrArray())
3798         return HttpPartDataType.ARRAY;
3799      return HttpPartDataType.STRING;
3800   }

3802   /**
3803    * Returns the <c>default</c> field of this schema.
3804    *
3805    * @return The default value for this schema, or <jk>null</jk> if not specified.
3806    * @see HttpPartSchema.Builder#_default(String)
3807    */
3808   public String getDefault() {
3809      return _default;
3810   }
3811
3812   /**
3813    * Returns the <c>collectionFormat</c> field of this schema.

3815    * @return The <c>collectionFormat</c> field of this schema, or <jk>null</jk> if not specified.
3816    * @see HttpPartSchema.Builder#collectionFormat(String)
3817    */
3818   public HttpPartCollectionFormat getCollectionFormat() {
3819      return collectionFormat;
3820   }
3821
3822   /**
3823    * Returns the <c>format</c> field of this schema.
3824    *
3825    * @see HttpPartSchema.Builder#format(String)
3826    * @return The <c>format</c> field of this schema, or <jk>null</jk> if not specified.
3827    */
3828   public HttpPartFormat getFormat() {
3829      return format;
3830   }
3831
3832   /**
3833    * Returns the <c>format</c> field of this schema.
3834    *
3835    * @param cm
3836    *    The class meta of the object.
3837    *    <br>Used to auto-detect the format if the format was not specified.
3838    * @return The <c>format</c> field of this schema, or <jk>null</jk> if not specified.
3839    * @see HttpPartSchema.Builder#format(String)
3840    */
3841   public HttpPartFormat getFormat(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
3842      if (format != HttpPartFormat.NO_FORMAT)
3843         return format;
3844      if (cm.isNumber()) {
3845         if (cm.isDecimal()) {
3846            if (cm.isDouble())
3847               return HttpPartFormat.DOUBLE;
3848            return HttpPartFormat.FLOAT;
3849         }
3850         if (cm.isLong())
3851            return HttpPartFormat.INT64;
3852         return HttpPartFormat.INT32;
3853      }
3854      return format;
3855   }

3863   public HttpPartSchema getItems() {
